meanings.definition: A tall wardrobe or cabinet, typically used for storing clothes.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother keeps her dresses neatly folded in the armoires.
meanings.sent2: The antique armoires in the bedroom added a touch of elegance to the decor.
meanings.sent3: When the armoires started dancing, it was quite a sight to see!
meanings.sent4: The armoires stood like silent guardians, protecting the secrets within.
meanings.sent5: The armoires loomed in the dim room, holding memories of generations past.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture with doors and shelves for storing items.
meanings.sent1: The living room armoires held a collection of books and trinkets.
meanings.sent2: We found the missing keys in one of the armoires in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The armoires whispered to each other, sharing stories of the objects they held.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a cluttered armoires, full of memories waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The armoires gleamed with a fresh coat of paint, ready to store new treasures.
